content: This is how absurd our new president is, Peggy. If you had seen this same ridiculous post about Obama, or Bush, or Clinton or any other president ever, you would not have spent a minute of your time reading it. But this disaster of a man is, yes, capable of demanding a reality tv show instead of focusing 100% on being a respected leader of the country and the free world. Sorry to lure you in but, oh goodness, Peggy, we all have to stay on our toes and resist, resist, RESIST! Thanks for reading. –AI
